item.title: @dalton: @michelelewis it seems like this is a semantic disagreement. What we are saying is that verification means nothing in and of itself. it just provides a mechanism to establish that the person that controls an account also controls a website @duerig
item.description: @michelelewis it seems like this is a semantic disagreement. What we are saying is that verification means nothing in and of itself. it just provides a mechanism to establish that the person that controls an account also controls a website @duerig

item.title: @dalton: @stumax thanks for the offer :) We are doing a portland meetup in the very near future, I think a Seattle one would be fun as well. I've seen some great Ignite talks before, ie Steven Levy talking about how he found Einstein's brain: http://bit.ly/10a8Fym
